name: A Stoney Journey
description:
My very first game. I made it for a game jam where you could only use batch language. be careful to respect the caps in your response and don't be too demanding. 

Embark on a journey where nothing makes sense and everything is a mix of Zork, H2G2 and the worst parodies you could find during 2000 internet

Also, it may triggers your antivirus, don't worry it's not a malware, it's just made with 0 skills
